title: 可以解釋到由送終到黑警鄉黑既theory

replies.msg:
轉載自美國移民香港人網友
My fellow Hong Kong righteous,It is undoubtedly that the recent rallies and riots between HK gov and righteous are mournful and melancholic.I am convinced that hongkongers’ hearts and hopes are all shattered after the full hearted dedication followed by series of failure.Frankly,I feel the same way.It is believed that it is the Central Government in China making all the mess.Nevertheless,I have reservations about this.I believe the conspiracy behind the whole event is deep and unexpectedly complicated.
I was born in United States and raised till seven until my father faded out from my life under United States's manipulation.I have come to Hong Kong under protection and anonymous. This event is highly classified and my identity may be revealed so i may not want to discuss the event here.
I am writing this because I have come up with a solid and concrete theory that explains the whole mess.It may sound unreasonable and unconvincing the first time you hear about it.Ponder about it and you will believe what i am saying.I am revealing all these
Everything is a conspiracy made by United States.Yes.I am saying the whole thing is made by United States you haven’t got me wrong.Well,i have observed the whole thing for a long time from umbrella revolution till now as a immigrated Hong Kong Citizen.
First,the Hong Kong Police Force is infiltrated by United States Force.Take a look of the senior officers chart.All the senior officers are graduates from United States university and most of them graduated from Harvard University.Moreover,the Regional Commander of Marine Mr Patrick Hodson is a Britain !What does all this imply?Needless to say,the logic goes.They all collide with American government to create this piece of shit!The "American Chinese" all must have received a sum of money from United States.They cooperate with the britain force that proposed the extradition law bill to create the whole riot.They use excessive force to tear the relationship between the police and the citizens.The most excessive force from the Marine department is inflicted to the citizens under the order of Mr Hodson.
Second,the extradition law is proposed by Carrie Lam as we know.Ponder more carefully and delicately,Carrie Lam's two sons are under Britain's protection and she receives benefit from Britain.She clearly proposed the bill under the order of Britain Government which is also controlled by United States.It is to cooperate with the riot that Hong Kong Police created and further triggers the aggression of the righteous towards the extradition law.
The ultimate aim of the whole conspiracy is to create riot between the police and the government and force China to unleash the Army and tackle our righteous.Dear righteous,Advantage is taken from the revolution.Britain supplies equipment under this ultimate aim.I am very sad that your aim is used not because of justice but conspiracy.
I honestly dont think the pigs from Central Government will create this mess when they are busy combating the trade war between it and US.The whole thing is under the conspiracy of United States to put Hong Kong into chaos.Believe it or not,it is certain that this is the truth.

中文版:
我的香港同胞是正義的，毫無疑問，香港政府和正義之間最近的集會和騷亂是悲傷和憂鬱的。我相信，在全心全意的奉獻之後，一系列的失敗之後，香港人的心和希望都被粉碎了。坦白說，我也有同樣的感受。相信中國的中央政府一切都是混亂。然而，我對此有所保留。我相信整個事件背後的陰謀是深刻的，出乎意料的複雜。
我出生在美國，一直到七歲，直到父親在美國的操縱下逐漸退出我的生活。我是在保護和匿名的情況下來到香港的。這個事件是高度機密的，我的身份可能會被揭示，所以我可能不想在這裡討論這個事件。
我寫這篇文章是因為我提出了一個堅實而具體的理論來解釋整個混亂。當你第一次聽到它時，聽起來可能聽起來不合理且難以理解。思考它，你會相信我在說什麼。我在揭示所有這些
一切都是美國製造的陰謀。是的。我說整個事情都是由美國製造的，你沒有把我弄錯。好吧，我已經從傘式革命到現在已經觀察了很長一段時間作為一個移民香港市民。
首先，香港警察部隊被美國軍隊滲透。看看高級軍官圖表。所有高級軍官都是美國大學畢業生，大部分都是哈佛大學畢業。另外，海軍陸戰隊區域指揮官帕特里克霍德森是一個英國！所有這一切意味著什麼？不用說，邏輯上去了。他們都與美國政府發生衝突，製造這片狗屎！“美國華人”都必須從美聯航收到一筆錢國家。他們與提出引渡法法案的英國軍隊合作製造了整個暴亂。他們過度使用武力來破壞警察與公民之間的關係。海事部門最大的過度武力是對公民的影響。霍德森先生的命令。
其次，引渡法是由我們所知的林嘉欣提出的。考慮到更加謹慎和細緻，林嘉欣的兩個兒子受到英國的保護，她從英國獲益。她明確提出了英國政府下令的法案。它與美國合作。它與香港警方製造的騷亂合作，進一步引發義人對引渡法的侵略。
整個陰謀的最終目的是在警察和政府之間製造騷亂，迫使中國釋放軍隊並解決我們的正義。親愛的，優勢來自革命。英國在這個最終目標下供應設備。我非常很遺憾你的目的不是用於正義而是用於陰謀。
老實說，我不認為來自中央政府的豬會在忙著打擊美國之間的貿易戰時製造這種混亂。整個事情都是在美國的陰謀下讓香港陷入混亂。不管你信不信，它是確定這是事實。

人手置頂
人手置頂

重點總結
1. 作者深受美國佬陷害, 但詳情唔講得
2. 香港騷亂唔關中國事, 係美國佬搞事
3. 香港警隊比美國佬滲透控制左, 因為佢地大部分都係哈佛畢業
4. 香港警隊收左美國佬錢, 使用過度武力挑起民憤
5. 林鄭兩個仔係英國保護, 林鄭收左錢
6. 逃犯條例係林鄭受英國佬指示提出
7. 最終目的係迫使中國出解放軍
